name: Banjan: The Bird of Light
description:
The kingdom of Banjan is in peril since the queen died. Monsters started to appear, darkness covered the land, and an evil demon has returned. Only the power of an ancient statue can bring light back to the kingdom and only king's son can wield its power.

Classic RPG Game play.
Unique intuitive game mechanics like Deck cards, Potion crafting, and more.
Over 100 monsters to battle.
9 Challenging dungeons to explore.
A dozen side quests to complete.
